travelAgencyModel

Class TravelsList

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelAgencyModel.TravelsList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TravelsList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    ArrayList backed list containing instances of classes extending Travel
    Author:
    DVN, Afonso, Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      TravelsList()
      Default constructor initializes the backing ArrayList.

    • Method Detail

      • addTravel

        public void addTravel(Travel travel)
        Adds the specified Travel to the collection.
        Parameters:
        travel - the Travel to add to the collection.

      • deleteTravel

        public void deleteTravel(Travel travel)
        Removes the Travel from the collection which satisfies the travel.equals() method, if any.
        Parameters:
        travel - The Travel to remove.

      • hasReservationFor

        public boolean hasReservationFor(Bus what,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
        Determines if this TravelsList has a Travel which has a reservation for the specified Bus within the specified time period.
        Parameters:
        what - The Bus that is checked for a preexisting reservation.
        startDate - The LocalDateTime which specifies the start of the time interval.
        endDate - The LocalDateTime which specifies the end of the time interval.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified Bus already has a reservation within the specified time interval

      • getCustomerFrequency

        public int getCustomerFrequency(Customer customer)
        Determines how many times a given Customer has been registered in a Travel.
        Parameters:
        customer - The Customer to check the reservation frequency of.
        Returns:
        The sum of all registrations for the given Customer.

      • hasReservationFor

        public boolean hasReservationFor(Chauffeur what,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime startDate,
                                 java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
        Determines if this TravelsList has a Travel which has a reservation for the specified Chauffeur within the specified time period.
        Parameters:
        what - The Chauffeur that is checked for a preexisting reservation.
        startDate - The LocalDateTime which specifies the start of the time interval.
        endDate - The LocalDateTime which specifies the end of the time interval.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the specified Chauffeur already has a reservation within the specified time interval.

      • getNumberOftravels

        public int getNumberOftravels()
        Determines the number of Travels stored in the collection.
        Returns:
        The number of Travels stored in the collection.

      • search

        public Travel[] search(java.lang.String destination,
                       Chauffeur chauffeur,
                       Bus bus,
                       java.lang.Boolean inclusive)
        Searches for Travels that satisfies the given input parameters. If inclusive is passed as true, all of the Travels that matches any of the input parameters is returned. If inclusive is false, all of the Travels that matches all of the specified parameters are returned. If any of the passed parameters are null , they are ignored, in which case they do not affect the search result.
        Parameters:
        destination - A destination that is searched for in the Travels destinations collection.
        chauffeur - A Chauffeur that is searched for.
        bus - A Bus that is searched Bus.
        inclusive - Specifies whether the search should be done inclusive or exclusive.
        Returns:
        A collection of Travels that matches the search parameters.

      • search

        public Travel[] search(java.lang.String destination,
                       Chauffeur chauffeur,
                       Bus bus)
        Searches for Travels that satisfies the given input parameters. The search is inclusive and will therefore return all Travels that matches any of the given parameters. If any of the passed parameters are null , they are ignored, in which case they do not affect the search result.
        Parameters:
        destination - A destination that is searched for in the Travels destinations collection.
        chauffeur - A Chauffeur that is searched for.
        bus - A Bus that is searched Bus.
        Returns:
        A collection of Travels that matches the search parameters.

      • getAllTravels

        public Travel[] getAllTravels()
        Returns every Travel in the underlying collection as a shallow copy.
        Returns:
        A collection of Travels.

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String name,
                            int phoneNumber)
        Returns the first Customer in the underlying collection whose name and phoneNumber is equal to the provided arguments.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to look for.
        phoneNumber - The phone number to look for
        Returns:
        Returns the first instance of Customer that satisfies the condition if any, otherwise returns null.
